data.text: @_mdickson I mean, it does have Ed Harris so I understand. And environment eh? So kind of similar to how Home Alone is also a combined allegory about imperialism and the welfare state.

@_mdickson I just watched the trailer. Feel like that would do really really well in the current day. Side note: the Randy Newman song at the end of the trailer gives it a Pixar twist, making it all the more bonkers (gross?).
@_mdickson i love that movie. also Ed Harris!
